# Publications

### Vine Copula based Portfolio Level Conditional Risk Measure Forecasting

Emanuel Sommer, [Karoline Bax](https://www.karolinebax.com/), [Claudia Czado](https://www.math.cit.tum.de/math/personen/professuren/czado-claudia/)

Econometrics and Statistics | [DOI](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ecosta.2023.08.002) | Published 2023

# Software

### {portvine}

R Package for the portfolio level unconditional as well as conditional risk measure estimation for backtesting and stress testing using Vine Copula and ARMA-GARCH models.

[CRAN](https://cloud.r-project.org/package=portvine) | [GitHub](https://github.com/EmanuelSommer/portvine) | [Documentation](https://emanuelsommer.github.io/portvine/)
